r.s: The source code for the PEAR website manual bits
r.d: The pearweb_manual package contains the apidoc queue scripts and manual notes
r.n: - fix apidoc queue on Linux - use www role - script to fix apidoc queue - make apidoc-log.php suitable to low-bandwidth connections - better 404 manual error handling - adjustments for PhD built docs - fix Bug #16038: Links in manual header/footer are double encoded
